Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: The brief of the vessel. ~ Importance: DISCOURAGED -- this property may be set, but you are recommended not to unless the system default ("[empty] cup [of {liquid}]") is not satisfactory ~ Note: if you set the brief for the vessel, the automated "(empty) [vessel] (of [liquid])" brief feature will be disabled. You can manually set the brief to reflect the liquid by copy-pasting the brief found in Shared:food/drinks:UrVessel into your vessel, and modifying that to your liking.
The examine of the vessel. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.
The look of the vessel. ~ Importance: RECOMMENDED -- this property may be left out, but you are recommended to include it.
The type of vessel, described as a brief. VALID EXAMPLE: cup INVALID EXAMPLE: A cup. ~ Importance: OBLIGATORY -- this property must be set for the vessel to function properly

Notes:Category.Notes:Note: This is the reference object for VESSELS -- that is, containers for liquids such as cups and mugs and so on. This object can be duplicated, and the duplicate be renamed, and the individual properties be modified or deleted accordingly. ~ Please do note that picking the right UrParent is an important part of creating a new vessel, as this determines the capacity of the vessel. You are strongly discouraged from setting capacity/maxweight manually, as there are numerous UrParents for you to select from whose capacities have been carefully adjusted to reasonable values. See Shared:food/drinks:sizes:!README! for further information.
